'Now it's on to the playoffs' – Amon-Ra St. Brown after Lions' dominant win over Vikings | NFL on FOX
Video Details
"Now it's on to the playoffs." – Amon-Ra St. Brown after the Detroit Lions' dominant regular-season finale 30-20 win over the Minnesota Vikings.
22 MINS AGO・National Football League・1:03
NFL - Minnesota Vikings vs. Detroit Lions - 01/07/2024
